itemDescription: Welsh rugby union and rugby league footballer

wikipedia_page.main: Arthur Glyn Moses (born 30 May 1928) is a Welsh former rugby union and professional rugby league footballer who played in the 1940s and 1950s. He played club level rugby union (RU) for Newbridge RFC and Maesteg RFC, and representative level rugby league (RL) for Great Britain, Wales, Other Nationalities, and Great Britain & France, and at club level for Salford and St. Helens, as a fullback, i.e. number 1.
